name: mvccore/ext-tracy-mvccore
description: Extension for MvcCoreExt_Tracy extension to render and add into tracy debug panel current MvcCore application instance, printed by \Tracy\Dumper::toHtml(MvcCore::GetInstance()); to display main application objects used to render current page response. Rendered objects inside MvcCore app: MvcCore_Request, MvcCore_Response, MvcCore_Router, MvcCore_Controller, all preroute, predispatch and postdispatch configured handlers and many other internal application values.
